title: From Inside The Cage - Novel Updates
tags: Arranged Marriage   Cute Protagonist   Demon Lord   Demons   Doting Love Interests   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Handsome Male Lead   Inferiority Complex   Kind Love Interests   Misunderstandings   Royalty   Shameless Protagonist   Short Story   Vampires
author: Asahi Tenma   朝陽天満
description:
The war between the Human race and the Demon race has finally come to a truce. In accordance with a sentence in the contract signed at that time, I went to the Demon Country.

Was it as a sacrifice or as a guest of honor? I don’t know that as well. I went to the Demon country with determination, and now, I’m trapped in a cage like a birdcage.

Inside the cage, there is nothing to do but just quietly watch the Demon King and the others do their work…>
